name: Deep Dive (Joshuc)
description:
CONTROLS:

WASD - Movement

Left click - throw bomb

Right click - use grappling hook

DIVE DEEP!

In order to get the best of treasure, you have to dive as deep as you can, picking up chests as you go. Find the way down to the next level at the bottom of each level (hint: you may have to use your bombs to get to the exit!)

NOTE:

The brightness of some enemies has been known to be dark for some players. Please turn your brightness to high in order to combat this.
